Articles.Content: Hell yeah! Unity 4.0 will support Linux. HarvesteR, will KSP work on Linux with the new Unity engine?

Hell yeah! Unity 4.0 will support Linux. HarvesteR, will KSP work on Linux with the new Unity engine?

I\'m guessing it will take about a release or two, Linux has completely different code from windows and mac. For one the graphic coding is going to need to be different. Next is what key does what, the keys have different names. They would also need some beta testers.(Unless they dual-boot Ubuntu onto their PCs even then, it helps to have beta testers. Linux support would take a while.

I\'m very happy that unity 4 will support Linux actually. A significant amount of KSP players are actually running it on Linux, using Wine. Having native Linux builds would be very cool.

I really can\'t wait to see what Unity 4 looks like hands-on.

Cheers

This addition to the unity platform is being discussed at the following link:
